name: SpaceCorn
description: You're a unicorn in an alien planet. Now what?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7 Processor: 1Ghz or more Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD APU Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Not required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7 Processor: 1.5 Ghz or more Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD APU Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Not required

reviews.review_text: break my horn > has the choice to suicide or enter a strange house > enter the house > sit > get up > exit the game > lauch the game > break my horn again > suicide > finish the game  11/10 would suicide again
THIS GAME IS AWESOME
this game so funny all my friends who play it wants to punch me in the face this game made my day hope too see more added to it i loved the game
This is the amazing tale of a Space Unicorn lost in what appears to be an alternate Unicorn reality. It ends on a cliffhanger. I'm excited for part 2.
I found 2 pink dildoes. I used a key as a ♥♥♥♥♥ I don't know what to do anymore with my life. I'm glad I didn't use my own money on this.

I sat down, whipped my ♥♥♥♥♥ out to watch a porn flick. Unfortunatley it had transvestites in it so I died. I restarted and continued down the hall. I found a cave with an ogre with 3 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ having gay sex.   8/10 IGN...
this game really opened my mind to the dangers of autism 10/10
its a weird game
I had a fun time playing this game. My sense of humour is pretty large so I had fun.
Was I the only one who spammed fap again?
You can fap as many times as you want. 10/10

Sat down and watched gay porn until i died 10/10  Shoved a key up my ♥♥♥, and it opened a door 10/10  Walked up to a prison cell and watched a troll have gloryhole sex with 5 guys 11/10  This all happened within my first 5 minutes of playing the game.....  10/10 would be a gay space unicorn again!

I like the game for what it is. I saw the trailer and thought I would try it. Its only $1. So, why not? I liked it for its content. I looked through the reviews after I played and I guess this game isn't everyones type of game. I like games like this. Theres just one small problem with it, the ending with the chapter. The text goes by to fast before the credits... I can't read the endings for the chapter. I wish I could.... Also, I can't wait for more of the series. I wish I could find more games like this. I heard that there is a very old game like this my mom played back when she was in her teens. She said it was very challenging compared to this. Also, it involved surviving. Otherwise you died and you had to start all the way at the beginning. :)

Crafted some cards.Got coupon for Spacecorn (75%).Checked the game and the price on steam (this game is gay).Saw steam trading cards.Searched SpaceCorn trading card in market to check cards price.Bought this game around 0.25$.Got 3 cards around $0.20-$.056.  10rainbows/10 unicorns  Thanks gaben.

Funny game. Limited options though. If you take the path I did you fight the goons of the 3 ♥♥♥♥♥ ogre (Alfred) and they attack you with giant ♥♥♥♥♥♥ and you black out.

Where do I start...  I got this game because I was bored and scrolling through the >$1 section in the store. And it was very different from what I was expecting. While it may be very humorous, some parts go a tad overboard in my opinion so I only recommend this game if you enjoy being mentally scarred.
The game lasted five minutes filled with childish jokes and a horrible storyline...

For those who like me were worried that they would somehow delete their system32 if they deleted local content for this game, fear not. Most of the humour was inuendo and sloppy memes, not very memmerable. I wish I had the option to commit suicide more often. horses don't even have arms.  4/10
4..chan (steam is censoring that word for whatever reason) the game. Has 1 chapter, finishing it takes 10 minutes or less.
Do not buy. Anti-virus says this game a trojan. The developer doesn't respond to emails about it. The game isn't even any good anyways.
10 minute gameplay filled with fapping and memes - true story
Terrible game. ♥♥♥♥♥♥ jokes. Hates on transgender individuals and there's no way to win. Don't bother. I have completed this game and it's been what, 15 mins? It's that bad.
Get a real text-based adventure game.
Seriously. This was pretty dang bad. Needs so much more work.
